title: Comparison of Online Portfolio Selection Algorithms

title: Texas Grid Load Tracker: Real-Time Power Capacity Graph

description: Attempted to repurpose LSTM-based neural sequence-to-sequence language model to the domain of long-form text summarization.

description: Developed a question-answering system for HQ Trivia app with realtime OCR in a weekend, with blog post explaining how to mitigate such approaches. Blog post was referenced in articles by The Verge and the Washington Post.
